price: O'na (doğrulayıcı) bir melek indirilmeli değil miydi? derler. Eğer bir melek indirseydik, (tevbe için) beklenmeden iş bitirilirdi.
arabic: وَقَالُواْ لَوۡلَآ أُنزِلَ عَلَيۡهِ مَلَكٞۖ وَلَوۡ أَنزَلۡنَا مَلَكٗا لَّقُضِيَ ٱلۡأَمۡرُ ثُمَّ لَا يُنظَرُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waqālū lawlā unzila ʿalayhi malakun walaw anzalnā malakan laquḍiya al-amru thumma lā yunẓarūna
translations: respite would have been granted to them
